creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: four human figures; figure at far R sits, cross-legged playing an instrument on his lap; second figure sits with PR side to viewer, facing instrument player, with white robe and black head covering; a small object sits between the first two figures; third figure sits cross-legged, 3/4 view to viewer, wearing grey robe, hands in sleeves; fourth figure at L sits hunched over a bundled object; two characters at URC
inscription:
Inscription and Mark

URC, in Japanese
title: Playing the Qin
